name: CITIZEN
sampleDescriptions: Educate policymakers on Citizens contact tracing technology.
Educate policymakers on Citizen's contact tracing technology.
Monitor police reform legislation, including S. 3985, the JUSTICE Act, and H.R. 7120, George Floyd Justice in Policing Act of 2020.
